result.name: seawater-temperature-records-for-the-uk-shelf-09-electronic-data-storage-tag-database
result.notes:
This dataset has been extracted as part of an exercise to assemble "all" Cefas 
Temperature Data and publish it in a Data paper. It is one of 17 Cefas data 
sources assembled. Electronic tags that record temperature and depth were 
attached to, or implanted into, cod caught in the southern North Sea between 
1999 and 2009 (for methods see Neat et al., 2014). Data from tags that were 
returned from recaptured cod were downloaded and the depth time series was 
used to estimate daily geographic location.

organization.name: marine-environmental-data-information-network
organization.title: Marine Environmental Data & Information Network
organization.description: MEDIN is a partnership of UK organisations committed to improving access to marine data. Our partners are both public and private sector.

result.title: Seawater temperature records for the UK Shelf - 09 - Electronic Data Storage Tag Database
